title: The Change in the Game
description: He never thought one man could push him this far.In an effort to save the University of Wisconsin’s men’s hockey team from a rogue player, Brian Weber is pressured by the coach to join the team. Except for one thing, he doesn’t know a thing about hockey. Fresh on the team with no knowledge, he’s hastily trained up by his one-and-only boyfriend, Andrew Engel. His newly-founded passion for the sport brings him even closer to the man he dedicated his life to. Will the team last under someone with no experience? Most importantly, will Brian survive playing against players with a lifetime of experience?
author: B.Q. Hanson
